import React from 'react' import './Testimonials.scss' import comentarios from '../../util/testimonials.json'; const Testimonials = () => { const list = comentarios; return(

Testimonials

{list.map(items=>
{items.desc}

{items.name}

{items.speciality}
)}
) } export default Testimonials
